Posts.Content: dffclt wrote: Hey...I had posted a while ago that I was having surgery on 9/4. Well, I made it. Feeling sore still and cranky but worlds better than last week. I find myself obsessing about every little thing and worrying a lot. Maybe just a stress hangover? Well, thanks to everyone for the support before my surgery. I am glad it is over. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 9 days post surgery...I made it! dffclt PinkFairy

Posts.Content: Sep 13, 2007 10:22AM dffclt wrote: Hi: I too came down with a cold about 10 days before my surgery. Nobody at my docs office seemed to be impressed with that at all. The general consensus was that if I did not have a fever and wasn't coughing up green stuff then the surgery would go on as planned. It did go as scheduled and I actually had a sinus infection when they did it. No problems. Every doctor is different but I bet you'll make it. Colds peak at day 3 or 4. That gives you plenty of time to get better. Feel good and get some rest.
Posts.Title: Help! A cold 8 days before surgery! ladydi shelray
